languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, вы считаете все это... предприятие... разумным решением? Не удивлюсь, если все это закончится засадой".
"Lord Captain, do you think this... enterprise... is wise? I wouldn't be surprised if this all turns out to be a trap."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, вы считаете все это... предприятие... разумным решением? Не удивлюсь, если все это закончится засадой".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, do you think this... enterprise... is wise? I wouldn't be surprised if this all turns out to be a trap."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, do you think this... enterprise... is wise? I wouldn't be surprised if this all turns out to be a trap."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, do you think this... enterprise... is wise? I wouldn't be surprised if this all turns out to be a trap."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, do you think this... enterprise... is wise? I wouldn't be surprised if this all turns out to be a trap."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，您认为这场……探索……是个明智的选择吗？如果到最后，我们发现这一切都是个陷阱，我并不会感到惊讶。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you think this... enterprise... is wise? I wouldn't be surprised if this all turns out to be a trap."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您认为这场……探索……是个明智的选择吗？如果到最后，我们发现这一切都是个陷阱，我并不会感到惊讶。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ¿cree que esta... empresa... es sensata? No me sorprendería que todo esto resultara ser una trampa».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you think this... enterprise... is wise? I wouldn't be surprised if this all turns out to be a trap."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ¿cree que esta... empresa... es sensata? No me sorprendería que todo esto resultara ser una trampa».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この…事業は…賢明だと思いますか？これがすべて罠だったとしても、私は驚きはしません」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you think this... enterprise... is wise? I wouldn't be surprised if this all turns out to be a trap."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この…事業は…賢明だと思うかね？これがすべて罠だったとしても、私は驚きはすまい」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, denkt Ihr, diese ... Unternehmung ... ist klug? Ich wäre nicht überrascht, wenn sich das alles als Falle erweist."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you think this... enterprise... is wise? I wouldn't be surprised if this all turns out to be a trap."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, denkt Ihr, diese ... Unternehmung ... ist klug? Ich wäre nicht überrascht, wenn sich das alles als Falle erweist."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, pensez-vous vraiment que toute cette entreprise soit... sage ? Je ne serai pas surpris que nous foncions tout droit dans un piège. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you think this... enterprise... is wise? I wouldn't be surprised if this all turns out to be a trap."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, pensez-vous vraiment que toute cette entreprise soit... sage ? Je ne serai pas surpris que nous foncions tout droit dans un piège. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, sizce bu girişim... Akıllıca mı? Bütün bunlar sonunda bir tuzak çıkarsa şaşırmam."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you think this... enterprise... is wise? I wouldn't be surprised if this all turns out to be a trap."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, sizce bu girişim... Akıllıca mı? Bütün bunlar sonunda bir tuzak çıkarsa şaşırmam."
